title: Bug 121682: Exception is thrown when exporting data from a table containing highlight/map
description: Description: An exception is thrown when attempting to export data from the attached report.
OB: When attempting to export data from a table that contains a group, a highlight rule, and a map rule in the group row, an exception is thrown in the ReportEngineService.getMetaData() method.
EB: Export the data from the table should not throw an exception.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Add a table to the report that includes a group, a highlight rule, and a map rule in the group row.
2. Preview the attached report.
3. Attempt to export the data from the table.
